How it works?

You Invest

You can buy shares and own a piece of a Real Estate Investment Trust (REIT).

Tenants pay rent

Our portfolio of properties generates monthly rental payments from our tenants.

The REIT distributes taxable income

We set out to pay you cash distributions each month from the rental income our tenants pay.

How we select assets

Our team consists of real estate industry veterans, who fully vet all Modiv properties before they are added to our portfolio. Our analysts conduct extensive research to choose properties that will give our customers the best return on their investment.

View Portfolio

Modiv Investment Journey

Start investing with as little as 500$ in 4 simple steps

1 — Create Your Account

Complete your account profile online with Modiv.com.

2 — Submit Your Investment Request in Minutes:

When you are ready to invest, you can quickly submit your investment request online. Our team will process your transaction as soon as we verify you meet the investor qualifications for the offering. If you have any questions, you can contact our support team at 888-68-MODIV.

3 — Track Your Investments

You have full visibility into the performance of your investment via the Modiv dashboard, Track your total current invested value and distributions. You'll receive quarterly investment reports and annual tax documents
